question: A group of kids came to buy action hero toys. If they want to share the toy equally among 4 kids, write the division equation for this.
A customer visited the toy store to buy stuffed animals to share them among 3 kids, write the division equation for this.
A group of 4 friends came to buy puzzles to share equally among themselves. Write the division equation for this.
Divide the toy cars among 2 children equally and fill in the given blanks.
A group of friends came to buy board games to share equally among themselves. Fill in the blank to complete the equation.
A customer wants to buy dolls as a return gift for her daughter's birthday. Divide the dolls equally among 4 girls.
Divide the chess game equally between 2 kids and fill in the empty blanks.
Fill in the blanks after sharing the teddy bears equally among 3 children.
Divide the 9 toy trains equally among 3 friends and fill in the given blanks.
A group of friends came to buy fidget spinners to share them equally among themselves. Write the division equation for this.
